knimeNode.name: Table Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads table written by the Table Writer node.

fullDescription.intro: This node reads files that have been written using the Table Writer node (which uses an internal format). It retains all meta information such as domain, properties, colors, size.
fullDescription.option: Select this option if you want to read only the first few lines.

ports.outPort: The table contained in the selected file.
